name: Yallaiah Onteru
title: Lead QA Automation Engineer
professional_summary: Utilized [Java, Selenium] to design and implement automation frameworks for healthcare claims processing, reducing manual effort by ensuring consistent test coverage across critical workflows.
Built hybrid frameworks combining [Data-Driven and BDD models] using [Cypress] for scalable and maintainable test automation in banking applications, improving test efficiency.
Mentored QA team members on [framework development, CI/CD integration] using [Jenkins, GitHub Actions], enhancing team productivity and code quality.
Contributed to [reusable framework components] and [shared libraries] in [Python, REST Assured], promoting code reusability across multiple projects.
Led automation initiatives for [E2E testing] of healthcare portals using [Selenium, TestNG], ensuring comprehensive test coverage and faster release cycles.
Collaborated with [product owners] and [business SMEs] to define test strategies and ensure alignment with business requirements in healthcare projects.
Coordinated [UAT sessions] with business stakeholders for government portals, ensuring smooth user acceptance and feedback integration.
Managed the full [defect lifecycle] using [JIRA, Azure DevOps], improving defect resolution time and tracking in banking applications.
Conducted [performance and load testing] with [Apache JMeter] for high-volume claims processing, identifying bottlenecks and improving system scalability.
Executed [regression, smoke, and functional testing] for healthcare and banking applications, ensuring stability and reliability across releases.
Implemented [CI/CD pipelines] using [Jenkins, GitLab] for automated test execution, reducing deployment time and increasing release frequency.
Performed [post-deployment validation] for critical healthcare systems, ensuring seamless production rollouts and minimizing downtime.
Utilized [SQL, PostgreSQL] for data validation and verification in healthcare and banking applications, ensuring data integrity and accuracy.
Applied [Agile methodologies] in healthcare and banking projects, facilitating iterative development and continuous improvement.
Integrated [API testing] using [Postman, REST Assured] for healthcare and banking APIs, ensuring robust backend functionality.
Conducted [cross-browser testing] using [Selenium Grid] for web applications, ensuring compatibility across multiple browsers and platforms.
Implemented [version control] using [Git, GitHub] for test scripts and frameworks, maintaining code history and collaboration across teams.
Provided [training and documentation] on automation tools and frameworks to QA teams, fostering knowledge sharing and skill development.
